item.title: CVE-2024-35733|2024-06-08T12:50:24.393Z -- rldd -- auto%20coupons%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in RLDD Auto Coupons for WooCommerce allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Auto Coupons for WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.0.14.
